utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Previously on Friends.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean, I don’t feel like I even have a girlfriend anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You want me to just quit my job so that you can feel like you’ve got a girlfriend?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is this about Mark?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, it’s not, it’s not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God. I cannot keep having this same fight with you Ross! Look, urrgh, maybe we should take a break.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine, you’re right. Let’s ah, let’s take a break, let’s cool off, okay, let’s get some frozen yoghurt, or something..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. A break from us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Then, we had this big, stupid fight, and I said I wanted to take a break, I don’t want to take a break.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’ve been thinking, this is crazy, I mean don’t, don’t you think we can work on this?

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Hey, what do you want to drink?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who’s that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nobody.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is that Mark?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, honey, look he just came over to....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! Got it!

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Hey, come dance. What? Are you married? ‘Cause that’s okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How’s the big anniversary dinner?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, we never actually got to dinner.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohhh, nice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, we kinda broke up instead.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God, Monica it’s on the ceiling.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s okay, this is more important than fruit on my ceiling! You broke up?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, but it’s okay, because when Ross left Mark came over.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel, you and Mark?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no-no, it’s okay, calm down. Mark and I talked, and I realised how much I love your stupid brother, and, yeah, we got our problems, but I really want to make it work.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Morning!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi, it’s me. I’ve been trying to reach you all night. I feel awful. Please, Ross, you gotta know there is nothing between me and Mark. This whole break-up thing is just stupid.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Eh, I’m just so sorry I put you through it. And, I y'know, I don’t want to get back together over a machine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Na-huh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So, I love you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And y'know what, I’m gonna, I’m gonna go to bed now, but ah, on my way to work tomorrow morning, I’m gonna stop by around 8:30.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chloe, Chloe how’s it coming?!!

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Hey, what kind of puppy do you think I should get?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, oh, hey, I don’t know. How about a big one?

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: But my apartment is so...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well then a small one!! Listen, let’s, we kinda have to get going!

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Wait! Where’s my shoes?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You, you sure you need shoes? Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Do I know why we’re rushing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know the ah, the girlfriend I told you about last night? Well it turns out she ah, she wants to get back together with me. Oh, I found it!!

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: That’s so great for you guys!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: You must be so happy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yes I am, one of the many things I’m feeling. Well....

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Good luck, with your girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, thank you. Hey, hey. Rachel!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi. Ohhh, you got my message.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, oh hey, you are right on time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So what do you say? Can I be your girlfriend again?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, you can, very much.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ahhhh!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, why are you mopping your ceiling?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, there’s banana on it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow, I have the spirit of an old Indian women living in mine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So then you know?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: The mailman was downstairs, so I brought up your mail.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, good. Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now what is Fabutec?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, all right don’t judge me to much. Okay? Um, but I saw this info-mercial, and um, I swear to you I have never-ever bought anything on TV before, except for this mop. But there was this stuff on leg waxing, it just, it looked so amazing....

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Waxine!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes! Have you seen it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it’s incredible! I so want to be a Waxine girl.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: God. Do think it really doesn’t hurt? ‘Cause how can they do that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello! Organic substances recently discovered in the depths of the rain forest!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: They have the best stuff in there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. We figured when we couldn’t find you, you’d gone home to make up with Rachel. Which is probably what you shoulda done. Huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You think?! God, I, ah, I’m in hell. I mean what, what am I gonna do? Rachel’s all like, ‘I love you and, and let’s work on this.’ And all I can think about is, ‘What is she gonna do? What is she gonna say?’ when I tell her what I did.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, before we answer that, I think we should address the more important question. How dumb are you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! Look, we’re trying to rebuild a relationship here, right. How am I supposed to do that here, without being totally honest with each other?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, Ross look, I’m on board about this totally honesty thing, I am, just not about stuff that’s gonna get you in trouble.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He’s right. Nobody’s gonna benefit, and you’re just gonna hurt her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, and there won’t be a relationship left to rebuild.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, but don’t you think....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right look, if you absolutely have to tell her, at least wait until the timing’s right. And that’s what deathbeds are for.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, okay, now, we just have to make sure she doesn’t find out some other way. Did you think about the trail?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What trail?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The trail from the woman you did it with to the woman you hope never finds out who did it! You always have to think about the trail!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I-I don’t think there’s any trail.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, okay-okay, ah, Chloe works with that guy Issac. Issac’s sister is Jasmine. And Jasmine works at that message place with Phoebe. And Phoebe’s friends with Rachel. And that’s the trail, I did it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: After applying the Waxine and linen strips to leg number one,

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did that!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Grasp one of the linen strips by its ‘easy grab tab’ and pull it off in one quick pain free motion.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Ow!!!!! Ow-oh-oh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Was it not pain-free?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No. It was painful. Oh my God , they should call it Pain-zine, now with a little wax.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Huh, well, the girls in the satin nighties on the commercial don’t seem to think it’s that bad.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s because their nerves are probably deadened from being so stupid. But hey, y'know if you don’t believe me, please, by my guest.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ow-ow-ow-ow! Oh my God!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now, are you glad we didn’t start with the bikini strips?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chloe? Hi..

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Is this about me taking your watch?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You took my watch?

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: I’m sorry, I do that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just you keep it, listen did you, did you tell anyone about us?

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Oh no. I feel it isn’t really anybody’s business, y'know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Exactly. So you didn’t, didn’t mention anything to Issac right?

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Oh, well I tell Issac everything.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You tell, of course you do. Issac. Issac. Hey, Issac. Issac, hi! Y'know we haven’t actually met...

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: You dog!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, I suppose I am a dog. But Issac, see I-I happen to have a girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Oh right, that Rachel chick from the coffee place.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s the one. Listen, I don’t want to hurt her.

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Oh, hey, man I know, doesn’t matter how much we love ‘em, monogamy is too cruel a rule.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Listen, can you keep this information to yourself?

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Aw, no problem dude. Y'know we got to look out for each other. We’re the same, you and me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Actually, no, we’re not.

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Yeah, we are.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, we’re not.

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Yeah, we are.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, we’re not!!

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: Okay, we’re not.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: But, we are.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine. I just need to know that you’re not gonna tell your sister.

utterance.speaker: Issac
utterance.content: I can promise not to tell her again.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Jasmine?

utterance.speaker: Jasmine
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We met at Phoebe’s birthday party, I’m, I’m Ross Geller.

utterance.speaker: Jasmine
utterance.content: You did a bad thing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, I did.

utterance.speaker: Jasmine
utterance.content: Very bad!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Very bad.

utterance.speaker: Jasmine
utterance.content: Very, very bad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m agreeing with you. Did you, listen, did you happen to tell Phoebe yet?

utterance.speaker: Jasmine
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, Jasmine, please, please don’t. I love my girlfriend very much, and I want more than anything to just work it out with her. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Jasmine
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Jasmine
utterance.content: But you should probably talk to my roommate, because I told him and he knows Phoebe too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who’s your roommate?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Gunther! Gunther. Gunther, please tell me you didn’t say anything to Rachel about me and the girl from the Xerox place.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: I’m sorry. Was I not supposed to?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ow!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ow!! Ow!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ow!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica and Phoebe
utterance.content: Ow!!!!!!! Ow-ow-ow-ow!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We’re all right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s okay, it’s okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We’re all right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We were just waxing our legs.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Off?!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: For your information, this happens to be a pain like no man will ever experience.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well I don’t think you can make that statement, unless you’ve been kicked in an area that God only meant to be treated nicely.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I think that women just have a lower threshold of pain than men, that’s all. I mean, come on, it’s just a little wax.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, come here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that’s mature.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, fine, so now what, I just pull it off?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on, Rachel, come on! Talk to me! Please!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can’t talk to you. I can’t even look at you right now!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nothing, nothing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel said everything was okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What, what are they talking about?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just get away from me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, it was a mistake! I made a mistake! Okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A mistake?! What were you trying to put it in? Her purse?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Whe-where did he put it?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, you had sex with another woman!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I knew something had to be wrong, because my fingernails did not grow at all yesterday.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well, I guess they had a fight, and he got drunk....

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh!! You guys knew about this and you didn’t tell us?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He has sex, and we get hit in our heads.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know what, I want you to leave! Get outta here!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just get out! Now!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!! No!! I wanna stay. I wanna talk about this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay! All right! How was she?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Was she good?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don’t answer that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on Ross! You said you wanted to talk about it, let’s talk about it!! How was she?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She was...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Awful! Horrible!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She was not good. Not good.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She was nothing compared to you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She, she was different.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ewwwww!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good different?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nobody likes change.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Okay, okay, okay, okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Should we do something?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, never cheat on Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry, okay, I’m sorry. I wa-I was disgusted with myself, and this morning I was so, I was so upset and then I got your message and I was so happy, and all I wanted was to get her out of my apartment as fast as possible.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whoa!! Whoa, whoa, wait a minute. What time did your little friend leave? Oh my God. She was there? She was still there? She was in there, when I was in there?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen. Oh hey, hey, the important thing was that she meant, she meant nothing to me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And yet she was worth jeopardising our relationship!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I didn’t think there was a relationship to jeopardise. I thought we were broken up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We were on a break!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That, for all I knew would, could last forever. That to me is a break-up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You think you’re gonna get out of this on a technicality?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I’m not trying to get out of anything, okay. I thought our relationship was dead!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, you sure had a hell of a time at the wake!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know what, I don’t think we should listen to this anymore.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What, what are you doing? You can’t go out there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why not?! I’m hungry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because they’ll know we’ve been listening.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God! And to have to hear about it from Gunther!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on! Like I wanted him to tell you, I ran all over the place trying to make sure that didn’t happen!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that is so sweet. I think I’m falling in love with you all over again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know what, I think we can go out there. I mean they have more important things to worry about.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, we’ll be fine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look Rachel, I wanted to tell you, I thought I should, I-I did, and then Chandler and Joey convinced me not to.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wax the door shut, we’re never leaving, ever.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi, it’s Phoebe. Listen someone’s gonna have to take my 9:00 with Mr. Rehack, ‘cause it’s like 9:15 now, and I’m not there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Don’t you realise none of this would’ve ever happened if I didn’t think at that same moment you weren’t having sex with Mark?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right. Let’s say I had slept with Mark. Would you have been able to forgive me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes I would.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You’d be okay if you knew that Mark had kissed me, and been naked with me, and made love to me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You knew that our hot, sweaty, writhing bodies were....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la! Okay, okay, yeah, I would have been devastated but, I would still want to be with you. Because it’s, I mean it’s you.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Ohhhhh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Come on Rach, tell me what you’re thinking?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m thinking, I’m gonna order a pizza.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Order a pizza like, ‘I forgive you?’

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh man, pizza? I like pizza. Put olives on the pizza.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We could eat the wax! It’s organic.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh great, food with hair on it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, not the used wax.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because that would be crazy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, can I, can I get in on that? Because I’m kinda hungry myself.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine. Hi! Yes, I’d like to order a large pizza.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No anchovies.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: With ah, extra anchovies.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s okay, I’ll just pick ‘em off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, and could you please chop some up and just put it right there in the sauce?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You can have the last piece, if you want.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I should think so. You slept with someone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: They’re gonna get through this, aren’t they?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, come on, it’s Ross and Rachel, they’ve got too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What if they don’t?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You think I need a new walk?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well y'know, I’ve been walking the same way since high school. Y'know, y'know how some guys they walk into a room and everybody takes notice. I think I need a ‘take notice’ walk.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you actually saying these words?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What, now you’re not even taking to me? Look Rachel, I-I’m sorry, okay, I’m sorry, I was out of my mind. I thought I’d lost you, I didn’t know what to do. Come on! Come on, how insane must I have been to do something like this? Huh? I-I don’t cheat right, I, that’s not me, I’m not Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-ho-ho! Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey. It’s three in the morning. They don’t know that I’ve come home yet. You notice how neither one of them are wondering where I am.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know, people can be so self-involved.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what, y'know what, I’m-I’m not the one that wanted that, that break, okay. You’re the one that bailed on us. You’re the one that, that ran when things got just a little rough!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s what?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is neither here nor there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, well here we are. Now we’re in a tough spot again, Rach. What do you want to do? How do you want to handle it? Huh? Do you wanna fight for us? Or, do you wanna bail? Look, I, I did a terrible, stupid, stupid thing. Okay? And I’m sorry, I wish I could take it back, but I can’t. I just can’t see us throwing away something we know is so damn good. Rachel, I love you so much.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No Ross!! Don’t! You can’t just kiss me and think you’re gonna make it all go away, okay? It doesn’t work that way. It doesn’t just make it better. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I think you should go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I really think you need to go now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay. This morning you said there was nothing so big that we couldn’t work past it together...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, what the hell did I know!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, look, there’s got to be a way we can work past this. Okay, I can’t imagine, I can’t imagine my life without you. Without, without these arms, and your face, and this heart. Your good heart Rach, and, and....

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. I can’t, you’re a totally different person to me now. I used to think of you as somebody that would never, ever hurt me, ever. God, and now I just can’t stop picturing with her, I can’t, it doesn’t matter what you say, or what you do, Ross. It’s just changed, everything. Forever.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, but this can’t be it, I mean.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Then how come it is?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: They’ve been quiet for a long time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe she killed him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let’s go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that your new walk?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I really have to pee.
